import { useEffect } from 'react' const DashboardAsideBar = () => { const _ = function (selector) { return document.querySelector(selector) } const switchDisplay = (el) => { if (el.classList.contains('hidden')) { el.classList.remove('hidden') } else { el.classList.add('hidden') } } const handleSideNavDisplay = (ev) => { const profile = _('#profile') switchDisplay(profile) } return ( <>
